events.message: The insured called to report a vehicle collision on April 30th involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident as the damage was caused by a traffic collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the customer's vehicle accident claim issued earlier today.
The insured was contacted to acknowledge the receipt of their auto accident claim and was reassured the process has started.
The insured was requested to submit photos of the vehicle damage, the police report, and contact details of witnesses.
All requested documents including photos, police report, and witness statements have been received from the customer.
The claims team began a detailed investigation into the claim to verify fault and assess the extent of vehicle damage.
Investigation concluded confirming the other driver was at fault; vehicle damage assessed and repair estimates approved.
A settlement amount to cover the repairs and rental car reimbursement was proposed to the insured based on assessment.
The insured responded positively, expressing satisfaction with the proposed settlement and prompt communication.
Approval for the settlement was confirmed after final validation, initiating the payment process for vehicle repairs.
The settlement payment was issued to the insuredâ€™s account promptly to cover the claim-related vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was officially closed after confirmation that repairs were completed and the insured had no further issues.
All case files and documentation for this auto accident claim were archived and stored for future reference.
